mapper.select: select mem_no , m.dept_no , m.posi_no , id , pwd , office_email , personal_email , mem_name , phone , post , road_address , detail_address , mem_enrolldate , hire_date , regi , bank , account , profile , off_count , accept_status , mem_status , admin_status , dept_name , posi_name from member m join dept d on (m.dept_no = d.dept_no) join position p on (m.posi_no = p.posi_no) where mem_status = 'Y' and id = #{id} and pwd = #{pwd}
select mem_no , mem_name , phone , office_email , to_char(to_date(mem_enrolldate, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') mem_enrolldate from member where accept_status = 'N' order by mem_enrolldate desc

select mem_no , mem_name , phone , bank , regi , office_email , personal_email , post , road_address , detail_address , to_char(to_date(mem_enrolldate, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') mem_enrolldate , accept_status from member where mem_no = #{memNo}
update member set accept_status = 'C' where mem_no = #{memNo}

select mem_no , dept_name , posi_name , mem_name , phone , office_email from member m join dept d on (m.dept_no = d.dept_no) join position p on (m.posi_no = p.posi_no) where mem_status = 'Y' order by mem_no

select mem_no , profile , mem_name , dept_name , posi_name , phone , to_char(to_date(hire_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') hire_date , bank , account , regi , office_email , personal_email , post , road_address , detail_address , mem_status , admin_status from member m join dept d on (m.dept_no = d.dept_no) join position p on (m.posi_no = p.posi_no) where mem_no = #{memNo}
